content: in this legal case a court in naples ruled on the division of a jointly owned property between two parties one party was granted a ¼ share of the property while the other party was ordered to pay a sum of money to the first party the court also addressed claims for reimbursement of expenses such as renovation costs and condominium charges and determined the amounts owed the defendant was ordered to pay the plaintiff additionally the court considered a counterclaim for damages related to the end of a romantic relationship but found it inadmissible the court allocated the costs of the proceedings between the parties with three quarters to be paid by one party and the remaining quarter to be paid by the other the court authorized the transcription of the judgment by the registrar the ruling was made on november 7 2022
